name: Stunt Runner - A Hilarious New Take on Physics Puzzlers
blurb: Lemmings meets The Incredible Machine gameplay. Help stunt actor Smash Johnson make his epic comeback to the big screen!

rewards.reward: **********EARLY BIRD SPECIAL**********\r\n- \u201cIT\u2019S NOT A TOOMAH!\u201d -\r\nDigital download of the game, access to backer-only video updates, and a special in-game credit as an early bird backer.
- \u201cMY PRECIOUS.\u201d -\r\nDigital download of the game, access to backer-only video updates, and an in-game credit as a backer.
- "WELL PLAYED, SIR." - 24 HOUR EXCLUSIVE! Get instant access to the Alpha version of Stunt Runner and the Beta when it's available, plus all previous tiers.

- \u201cVERY NICE, HOW MUCH?\u201d\r\nSpecial edition of the game which contains a PDF version of the Stunt Runner Art Bible (concept art and a detailed look at our art pipeline), two digital wallpapers, a DRM-free copy of the game\u2019s soundtrack, a cover photo for Facebook, and all previous reward tiers.

**********EARLY BIRD SPECIAL**********\r\n- \u201c'IF YOU AIN'T FIRST, YOU'RE LAST.'\u201d - Get ALL FUTURE DIGITAL CONTENT FREE FOR LIFE that we make post-launch for Stunt Runner (levels, costumes, props -- any DLC), a special in-game credit as an early bird backer, plus all previous reward tiers.

- \u201cYOU\u2019RE GONNA NEED A BIGGER BOAT.\u201d - \r\nGet ALL FUTURE DIGITAL CONTENT FREE FOR LIFE that we make post-launch for Stunt Runner (levels, costumes, props -- any DLC), plus all previous reward tiers.

- \u201cI\u2019LL HAVE WHAT SHE\u2019S HAVING.\u201d -\r\nGet exclusive access to the Beta version of Stunt Runner and the ability to give us valuable feedback during the game\u2019s development to shape our design! Plus, get an extra game key to give Stunt Runner to a friend, and all previous reward tiers.
- \u201cINCONCEIVABLE!\u201d - \r\nGet physical with your choice of a black or white Stunt Runner Kickstarter T-Shirt and all previous reward tiers.

- \u201cHE LOOKS LIKE A PINK NIGHTMARE.\u201d -\r\nKICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE CONTENT - Get a special in-game pink bunny suit and a goofy hat that can ONLY be acquired by backing this tier or higher in our Kickstarter campaign, plus all previous reward tiers.

- \u201cTHAT BELONGS IN A MUSEUM.\u201d -  \r\nA glorious piece of Stunt Runner art ONLY available to backers in this tier -- digitally hand-painted, printed on canvas and wrapped around a solid wood box backing for hanging, signed by the development team, plus all previous non-limited reward tiers.
- \u201cSO DO YOU.\u201d -\r\nGet a 5\u201d tall 3D printed figurine of Smash Johnson with the base signed by the development team, plus all previous non-limited reward tiers.

- \u201cI KNOW KUNG FU.\u201d -\r\nWork with us to design an official level for our game and see your work featured in a shipped title! These levels will be part of the full game and will have your name on them as the designer. You\u2019ll be credited as a \u201cKickstarter Level Designer\u201d to be used for your resume or portfolio! You\u2019ll also receive all previous non-limited reward tiers.

- \u201cSO YOU\u2019RE TELLING ME THERE\u2019S A CHANCE.\u201d -\r\nCome join us at our launch party in San Francisco (travel not included), get four special edition copies of the game (on top of the one received at the $30 tier), and you\u2019ll receive an \u201cAssociate Producer\u201d credit with the option to participate in monthly Skype chats to help shape development. You\u2019ll also receive all previous non-limited reward tiers.

-\u201dI SHALL CALL HIM...MINI-ME.\u201d-\r\nWe\u2019ll model a stylized version of YOU and insert you as a character in Stunt Runner! Your character can have your name, your favorite gamer handle or a nickname (within reason of course). We\u2019ll also record your voice for your character and credit you as an Actor in Stunt Runner. Come join us at our launch party in San Francisco (travel not included), and get 4 special edition copies of the game (on top of the one received at the $30 tier) as well as all previous non-limited reward tiers.

- \u201cI\u2019VE A FEELING WE\u2019RE NOT IN KANSAS ANYMORE.\u201d - \r\nSpend the weekend with us in San Francisco! Sightseeing in the city, surfing lessons and more! We\u2019ll pay for two nights at the W Hotel, but you will be responsible for all flights to and from San Francisco. You\u2019ll be credited as a Producer in Stunt Runner, and you\u2019ll also receive four special edition copies of the game (on top of the one received at the $30 tier) and all previous non-limited reward tiers.

- \u201cMADE IT MA! TOP OF THE WORLD!\u201d\r\nThis is it! You are completely onboard with our vision for Stunt Runner! We will be attending a variety of trade shows to promote the game, and we would like YOU to join us. We will pay the price of your attendance, room, and board (airfare not included) at any show that we attend (minimum of three). Help us show off the game, hang out with other developers, and get a better idea of what our world is like. You\u2019ll receive an \u201cExecutive Producer\u201d credit, four special edition copies of the game (on top of the one received at the $30 tier) and all previous non-limited reward tiers. You will also receive a crown made of paper mache and tears of joy!
